questions.question: What is the purpose of array slice method?
options: The slice() method returns the selected elements in an object as a new array object.
The slice() method returns the selected elements in an array as a new array object.
The slice() method mutates the original array and returns the same modified array.
questions.answer: The slice() method returns the selected elements in an array as a new array object.

questions.question: Which of the following statements and their output is correct?
Which of the following is true?
options: localStorage persists data even after browser is closed and reopened.
sessionStorage persists data even after browser is closed and reopened.
localStorage is same as a cookie.
questions.answer: localStorage persists data even after browser is closed and reopened.

questions.question: Which of the following is true about window and document?
options: Window is the direct child of a document.
Document is the direct child of the window object.
Document is the root level element in any web page.
questions.answer: Document is the direct child of the window object.

options: is an inline element by default.
inline-block elements have the same behaviour as block elements.

questions.answer: <div> and <h1> are block elements by default.

questions.question: 'Select the option that is false about React.
